DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if iloprost is effective in the treatment of elevated arterial pulmonary pressure in children with ventilator treated respiratory distress syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Elevated Arterial Pulmonary Pressure With Inhaled Iloprost
DOC.criteria: Elevated arterial pulmonary pressure GA > 24 GW 2448 hours of age Ventilator treatment Congenital anomalies Severe hypotension
